formulas.raw: Check that \( f(a) \cdot f(b) < 0 \). If not, the method cannot start. Compute the midpoint \( m = \dfrac{a + b}{2} \). Evaluate \( f(m) \). If \( f(m) = 0 \) (or \( |f(m)| \) is within tolerance), stop: \( m \) is the root approximation. Otherwise, choose the new interval: If \( f(a) \cdot f(m) < 0 \), set \( b \gets m \). Else, set \( a \gets m \). Repeat from step 2 until the interval is smaller than the tolerance or you hit the iteration limit.
